stories.text: Just wondering if anyone has any experience in the crawling/SEO experience between the two.
stories.title: Ask HN: Would an Elixir/Phoenix LiveView be crawled better than a React SPA?

stories.text:
I was musing to myself about niches for programming languages, and started thinking about Function as a Service platforms. I realized that a lot of the "batteries included" that goes into a language's standard library are obviated or at least heavily overlap with the FaaS platform functionality.

How do you see this division of responsibilities evolving? What might make a language specifically designed for FaaS different?
stories.title: Ask HN: What's the role of a standard library for a language aimed at FaaS?

stories.text:
Is this supposed to be normal? Senior Dev and Mid-Dev joined same time but the senior dev controls most of the pairing session between the two devs and diplomatically discards your work. Also does work outside of the pairing session and brings it in as well. This senior dev is also favoured by the EM, which makes it hard for me to report to them about it.

What do you advise in this case because I'm becoming increasingly unhappy and this is my second month only at this place?
stories.title: Working with Controlling Senior Devs
